    Company Confidential Vacancies Head of Operations

    October 21, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Company Confidential is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Head of Operations position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Responsibilities
    • To oversee and manage the operations of the complex. 
    • To propose to the Management on any cost effective practices to improve and operational efficiency.
    • To liaise and communicate with all stakeholders including management representatives, suppliers, service providers etc.
    • To plan all the continuous improvement initiatives and constantly implement them to promote cost saving and operational efficiency. 
    • To conduct risk assessments of processes and tasks within the departments and evaluate the parameters to control the risks.
    • To prepare the annual operations budget and review the respective department’s capital expenditure proposal.
    • To prepare the management reports as required from time to time.
    Requirements
    • Diploma/Degree in Management/Engineering 
    • Possess Certificate of Chargeman BO
    • Minimum 5 years of working experience in the similar capacity.  
    • Meticulous, result oriented and highly organized.
    • Execellent communication skills in English and Bahasa Malaysia, both written and verbal.
    • Able to interact well with all levels of staff.
    • This position is to be based at JOHOR BAHRU. 

    Company Overview

    We are seeking dedicated and dynamic personnel to join us for the following position:-

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
    Apply Online
